---
title: "Tidyquant"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyquant)
```

```{r}
# CNK, SBUX, MSFT

stocks <- tq_get(c("CNK", "SBUX", "MSFT"), get = "stock.prices")
```

```{r}
ggplot(stocks, aes(x = date, y = adjusted, group = symbol, color = symbol)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_bw()
```
